Posts.Content: Hi JeanieB, I thought it was just me that was thinking that! I am not on FB so can't comment on that but it does seem to be on the tv much more now,  not sure if it is just because i am more aware of it now of if it is just coincidence! Could also be because i am currently off work and therefore watching more tv than usual haha
Posts.Title: Cancer overload on tv and facebook

Posts.Content: Ha ha mistmoley i think if you do meet your target, or even better, make the £250, you should get your husband to match the donation £ for £ good luck!
